about_the_game:
To celebrate Yes, Your Grace's ONE YEAR ANNIVERSARY we've got a special comic following the lives of Cedani, Asalia, Maya, Eryk and Aurelea for you to download for free!

Follow their stories after the game and find out what the Royal Family have been up to since you last visited Davern!

Includes 3 high-quality comics in full colour.

Once you've downloaded your DLC, right-click Yes, Your Grace in your Steam Library, navigate to Manage and select Browse Local Files - Your comics will be saved in this folder!
detailed_description:

Includes 3 high-quality comics in full colour.

Once you've downloaded your DLC, right-click Yes, Your Grace in your Steam Library, navigate to Manage and select Browse Local Files - Your comics will be saved in this folder!
name: Yes, Your Grace - Anniversary Comic

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:

  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
